Name: The Last Piece of Bacon
About the game: You are Jimmy Rustle, once a legendary gunslinger, now a gun for hire. After a nation wide economic collapse, small towns all over Nevada are on the brink of disaster. Drastic times call for drastic measures. You've been deputized as a member of government, and now, as newly declared Sheriff, you must protect your people and restore peace. Features Handcrafted levels Travel town defending locals from raiders. Skill based game play Being the better man isn't for the faint of heart. You'll be outnumbered, outgunned, and sometimes, outta luck. None of this matters when you have been blessed with the fastest hand in the west and an ammo crate bigger than Bush Mountain. Free downloadable content Content will grow alongside an endearing community, expect free, and fully featured downloadable content for life!
